references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concepts of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a key technique utilized in Di2Pose.

references.paper_title: Generating diverse high-fidelity images with vq-vae-2
references.reason: This paper introduces vector quantized variational autoencoders (VQ-VAEs), a crucial component of Di2Pose for pose quantization.
This paper presents a compositional pose representation method that inspires the pose quantization strategy in Di2Pose.

references.paper_title: Diffpose: Toward more reliable 3d pose estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the DiffPose model, a closely related diffusion-based 3D human pose estimation method that serves as a benchmark for Di2Pose.

references.paper_title: Human3.6m: Large scale datasets and predictive methods for 3d human sensing in natural environments
references.reason: This paper introduces the Human3.6M dataset, a primary benchmark dataset used for evaluating Di2Pose's performance.
